notes:
An end-of-year tidbit from the Brain behind "Whitey Bulgur" (WHITE MISCHIEF and Dickensian masterpieces such as APOSTROPHE NOW and BLEAK LAD.

During this festive season, Our Hero received a standard "" letter.

messages.subject: SO TELL US CAN WE GIVE THIS MAN INSTRUCTION TO MAKE THIS PAYMENT?

OF  
ATTORNEY TO MAKE YOUR  CLAIMS  FUND  OF $10.5MILLION   USD IN THE ATM

VIEWS AND 
COMMENTS ARE RECEIVED WITH REGARDS TO THIS  MATTER. PLEASE TRY AND GET BACK

NAME: MR.RACHELL BORDOY


ADDRESS: 80 WEST  170ST, APT C4 BRONX, NY 10452.


HIS  OFFICE TELEPHONE  NUMBER: +12062034058

SO TELL US CAN WE GIVE THIS MAN INSTRUCTION TO MAKE  THIS PAYMENT? OR YOU

NOTE PS: Let us use the words: "  Trust In God " as the  logo words in all

Awaiting for your urgent  response.


Awaiting for  your urgent response.


With best regard,
Officially Signed.
Prof.Henry William
(Director Foreign Department Zenith Bank Benin Republic)

messages.body:
Absolutely,  Give him the money.  He is my lover.  He and  I share 
everything.  
I will confess that he might flirt with you a bit  when you meet,
but 
don't take him seriously.  He's just being  playful.  He'll probably start 
joking about how he'd like to tie you up  to his bed and cover you with maple 
syrup and then lick it off slowly.   He does that to me all the time.  He's 
a funny guy. 





 




scamorama main street 
* 
get booked 
*
messages.raw:
Our Hero

Absolutely, Give him the money. He is my lover. He and I share everything.
I will confess that he might flirt with you a bit when you meet, but don't take him seriously. He's just being playful. He'll probably start joking about how he'd like to tie you up to his bed and cover you with maple syrup and then lick it off slowly. He does that to me all the time. He's a funny guy.

Happy scamalicious new year and stay safe out there!

 

scamorama main street * get booked *
